channel.title: Problem with battlescape 317 client windows 7
channel.description:
I'm making another server, and my friend (co-owner of the server) is trying to get on. (I have a few years of experience with servers, so I know everything's right on my side), but he has a problem loading the server client (based off of battlescape 317) on his windows seven laptop. On xp it runs fine for him, but I think there's an OS based issue. One of my admins is also having a similar issue with his laptop (you guessed it, windows seven). Does anybody have a fixed .bat file for running the client?
Here is my client's .bat: [code]@echo off cd files Start javaw -Xmx500M client 82 highmem exit [/code]

item.title: Problem with battlescape 317 client windows 7
item.dc:creator: @Pure_str433 Pure str433
item.description:
@Pure_str433 wrote:

Replace Start Javaw

With:

"C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe"

Read full topic
